title: Tamatar murghi (Indian tomato chicken)
ingredients: ['1 large onion, quartered', '4 cloves garlic', '1 slice fresh root ginger', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 dessertspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon ground turmeric', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1/2 teaspoon ground cardamom', '1 cinnamon stick, broken', '1/4 teaspoon ground cloves', '2 bay leaves', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '6 skinless chicken thighs', '1 (400g) tin peeled plum tomatoes, crushed']
